review: This is the best movie watching experience ever. We used to watch prime instant videos on my laptop and always had streaming issues or the laptop would run out of batteries.Also fun to play games with (all those free apps of the day).
author: TL

review: I didn't like the Fire TV, limited choices in other channel offerings or not the channels I was looking for. Lots of other channels that seemed useless to me. For what it offers I think it would be much better priced around $30-40 not the $80 I paid. I ended up going with the Apple TV and I'm much happier. Side by side the Apple is much quicker and easier to use, less confusing when searching for channels. I did however like the voice search, which ended up being a nice feature.
author: Lee Vanderlip

review: I have only been using it one day but so far am very satisfied with my fire tv. Easy set up but then didn't know-how to get the content to run. I discovered I had to purchase ( free through Amazon) and download "connection apps" on both the fire tv and my kindle fire HDX. I don't have the fastest internet connection so have had a few times where pauses occurred. Have not figured out how to play games without controller, but am not too concerned about that, tho it would be nice. Am hoping to b e able to downgrade to a less expensive Dish package now. I got my fire tv for $80, so all in all am very satisfied so far.
author: Kathy Schutte

review: So far, I love it. Easy to install and use. Being an Amazon Prime member is often an advantage.
